Hydras:

Hydras was in his quaters with a foul mood when he opened his comlink and 
said "Cyclonus... Report!"

-----Original Message----- 
From: Super Cyclonus
Sent: Monday, May 30, 2011 12:32 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Hydras and Predacons

> <OLD>
>
> �Do whatever you have to to solve those troubles: make something useful 
> with this base to  protec us and finout what is goin there� said coldy 
> Hydras

<NEW>

"Of course commander." Cyclonus said, loyal as ever. Cyclonus always
made an excellent second in command. Ever uncomfortable with command
of his own, he was content to follow orders and implement the will of
others. Such was his strength as well as his weakness in the ever
complex web of trecherey and lies amidst the Predacons. "I will send
out a few drones to investigate."

With that Cyclonus closed the connection, leaving Hydras to his own
thoughts. He was the leader of the only active faction of the
Predacons at the moment, or was he? With Cryotek active and who knows
who else, there could be other games afoot.

In the meantime the Maximals seemed just as tired and banged up as he
and his team were and both would need time to recover. The minions
appeared to be in a battle with the Insectile creatures, but without
more information it would be difficult to move foward.

What would Hydras do? What would be next? Only time would tell.

(TAG)

Preston
